players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Diana's sudden death. We must work together to find out who did this and bring them to justice."
Bob: "Let's focus on finding out who killed Diana and work together to make sure it doesn't happen again."

You: "I believe it's important that we all remain calm and focused during this time. Let's try to gather as much information as possible about Diana's death and any suspicious activities we may have observed."

Charlie: "Let's take a closer look at Diana's death. I noticed that Alice was acting suspiciously around the time of her murder. Can we discuss this further and see if anyone else observed anything unusual?"
